text: Cortinarius kytoevuorii is a species of fungus in the large mushroom genus Cortinarius (subgenus Phlegmacium). Found in coniferous forests of Finland and Sweden, the mushroom was described as new to science in 2014. The specific epithet honours Finnish mycologist Ilkka Kytövuori. ==See also== *List of Cortinarius species ==References== ==External links== * kytoevuorii Category:Fungi described in 2014 Category:Fungi of Finland Category:Fungi of Sweden
title: Cortinarius kytoevuorii
